name: Navy & White Anchors Nautical Underbust Corset Cincher
description: The Stella is a 10-panel steel-boned underbust waist cincher by SugarKitty Corsets. Sits approximately 2" below bustline, has medium back coverage, and very short on the hip & sides. Comes standard with a front busk closure. Available in sizes 18-32". If you're interested in upgrading to a fully-custom corset, please send a message. Features navy nautical themed cotton fabric on front & back panels, and white satin side panels. Has navy external bone casings & trim and white laces. Also features navy stripe trim on side panels, with crystal rhinestone detailing. Suitable for tightlacing! Corset Includes: -Novelty Cotton/Satin outer fabric -External bone casings -Twill lining -5/8" Satin Ribbon Laces -Two Part heavy duty grommets -1/4" Spring & Flat Steel Boning -Waist Tape Custom corsets have an 4-6 week turnaround time. If you need an item completed sooner, please send a convo! We may be able to accommodate you! Multiple custom items purchased at the same time may require additional time - please inquire ahead of time if you're on a time crunch! ALL SALES ARE FINAL! Please refer to the SugarKitty Policies page for more information: http://sugarkitty.bigcartel.com/returns-exchanges

name: Satin Mini Bloomers with Bows
description:
Handmade satin mini bloomers by SugarKitty Corsets! Made of heavy bridal satin in your choice of color (see swatches), these cute little bloomers are made to your measurements. The rise is approximately 9" (varies slightly by size). Adorned with a bow at the waist, and one at each leg. Bows come standard in black - additional colors are available by request. View Colors Here:
View Size Chart Here:
Because this is a custom, handmade item, turnaround time is 2-3 weeks. If you need an item sooner, please send a convo! Chances are, we'll be able to accommodate you! Multiple custom items purchased at the same time may require additional time - please inquire ahead of time if you're on a time crunch! ALL SALES ARE FINAL!
